With both of your bugs (this one and bug 58001) you seem to have a "bad" 
eclipse install.

Did the problems start immediately after you installed M8?
How did you install M8...in a clean location NOT over top of a previous 
install?

This appears to be happening because of MyEclipse IDE extension.
Therefore, feel free to close this bug.
